urls.title: AIRLINERATINGS.COM NAMES ITS TOP TEN LOW COST AIRLINES FOR 2022 - Airline Ratings
urls.description: The high public interest in affordable travel has prompted AirlineRatings.com, the world’s only safety, product, and COVID rating website, to identify the top ten low-cost airlines for 2022 from the almost 400 airlines it rates. Best Low-Cost Airlines – Top 10 The AirlineRatings top 10 LCCs for 2022 are, in alphabetical order: Allegiant Air, AirAsia, […]

data.text:
Flair was named one of 2022's Top Ten Low-Cost Airlines 🏆

We're honoured to be recognized by @Airline_ratings as an industry-leader, and we look forward to continue creating accessible, affordable and desirable air travel for all!

We're just gonna leave this splash of vacation inspo right here...

Soak up the sun this summer with Flair's affordable fares to Charlottetown. Visit https://t.co/4NVh6ErCon and start planning your East Cost escape today! #YYG 

📸 | @peicameraroll https://t.co/aHZybwZwl3

What would you do with FREE flights for a year? This could be YOU! Join us for every CEBL game for your chance at #ShotFromTheDot! There's 21 games left in the season... don't miss out! 🏀 #LetsBall #FlairxCEBL

We're still in shock from last night. 😳 Our very first #ShotFromTheDot winner from last night’s @FVBandits game, Malcolm Williams, scored BOTH shots, winning him a free trip to the @CEBLeague Championship Weekend in Ottawa AND free flights for a year to anywhere Flair flies!! ✈️ https://t.co/XVGnd7PFoT

urls.title: Flair Airlines is Canadian, licences won’t be revoked: CTA | Globalnews.ca
urls.description: The low-cost airline's licences that allow it to fly in Canada were in question due to the influence of U.S.-based investor 777 Partners LCC.

https://t.co/EnrJYs6oFc

So, THANK YOU!
Blue skies ahead.

urls.title: Customize & Book Cheap Flights to Kelowna | Flair Airlines
urls.description: Planning to fly to Kelowna? Fly solo or grab your favourite buddy and book cheap flights to Kelowna YLW. Book Flair Airlines now & save big!

data.text:
It's #NationalWineDay and we thought it was only appropriate to highlight the Napa of the North: KELOWNA 🔥
Soak up the sun this summer with Flair's affordable fares to #YLW. https://t.co/mjkJOqp4fq https://t.co/F1S2R8OZiI

Happy #AMTDay!Today we celebrate the brilliant technicians and maintenance crews who ensure the safety and security of every flight, incl. aircraft maintenance technician, Coach Matt Miller, based in Abbotsford! Thank you, techies! You always get it Wright 😉 https://t.co/U659UrvD6D

FLASH SALE: 48 hours only! ☀️Summer is on sale. Take 30% off base fare on all flights with code: EXPLORE30

*offer applies to base fare only. Limited seats for a limited time. For travel May 30 - October 31, 2022. Promo end: May 26, 2022. https://t.co/yzx2GBHcmj

domain.name: States
domain.description: States, provinces, or prefectures, like California or Fukushima Prefecture

data.text:
Va-moose to Alaska ✈️
Our new service from Vancouver to Anchorage starts up June 23rd. We can't wait for Flair flyers to enjoy this new destination with twice-weekly service from @yvrairport–@ANCairport and fares starting at just $99* https://t.co/Z7UiU9vlAB
*conditions may apply https://t.co/DVeOMmEwcI

#MayLongWeekend has finally arrived 🥳
It's the perfect time for a short stay in sin city with flair flights to Las Vegas starting at just $99*! https://t.co/3xRrCIhxmb

*one-way. taxes & fees incl. Limited seats available. https://t.co/lqlZOEGJKO

Airports are busy! Security wait times have increased in many Canadian airports. That’s why we’ve updated our check-in time deadlines to make travel easier for our passengers. Learn more at https://t.co/ScHKq7Cfpm https://t.co/MGxjAksSC6

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text:
Eyeing a little getaway? We got you. 💜
Flair is making long-weekend travel plans easy and affordable wIth routes from Windsor to Montréal starting at just $49 each way.* Book today at https://t.co/Ehj3JdcUFF #yqg #yul
*limited availability. conditions may apply. https://t.co/TLxYTHsaZb
RT @SeanCaseyLPC: I was pleased to meet with Stephen Jones, the CEO & Kent Breedlove, the General Counsel at @flairairlines to discuss thei…

Today marks the start of our nonstop service from @TorontoPearson to @fly2ohare. We're so excited to bring more low-cost options for Canadians! 🥳
#YYZ – #ORD routes are available for booking with fares starting at just $94*! https://t.co/hv55Dv0jfH
*certain conditions may apply. https://t.co/HCsYRoyLzG
RT @TorontoPearson: Deep dish pizza, anyone? 🤤 Our friends at @FlairAirlines start 3x weekly service to the wonderful city of Chicago today…

Yesterday's inaugural flight from #YLW to #YYJ is the first of many this week. This route flies 3x/weekly with one-way fares starting at just $39*. For more info or to book, visit https://t.co/BA5ynhj8D5
*taxes & fees incl. Limited seats available. https://t.co/oOJZDN8tjS

SALE: 80% off starts now!
Use promo code: FLY80FLAIR and get 80% off base fare on select routes for travel between May 20, 2022 - June 23, 2022*. Book now and save! https://t.co/iUFWTzftaN

*Limited seats available for a limited time (approx. 25,000 seats). Some conditions apply. https://t.co/RhYKUALNQw

data.text: It may be #FridayThe13th, but there's nothing to be afraid of. For booking, visit: https://t.co/43q4aXJMlm https://t.co/pcTeVMeJlO

data.text:
Hey Edmonton! 🚨 
Score HUGE savings and head south for Game 6 with 25% off base fare and only $5/day parking at jetSet parking!* Book flights at https://t.co/yvFXI6MNSO and parking at https://t.co/mTD7dax6do

*conditions apply. limited seats available. ends 12:00am MT 05/12/22 https://t.co/cAgn6Hc9Rs

entity.name: It's Mother's Day
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text:
Happy #MothersDay to all the moms out there! 💖
However you're spending your day, we hope you make it all about you (for once). Thank you for always lifting us up. We think you deserve a window seat today, and everyday! https://t.co/8JW54cMT1z

Sunset capital of Canada? They don't call Saskatchewan the "Land of the Living Skies" for nothing. Along with the city, the badlands, and everything in-between, this nightly show is certainly worth a trip to #YXE.

Visit https://t.co/33Y0pNVyT1 to book.

📸: @harryberry via ig https://t.co/h4MXh5y73S

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text:
NEW service: Kitchener-Waterloo–Montreal 🥳This new route is part of our recent base expansion at @FlyYKF. Non-stop service to #YUL from #YKF begins July 7 (2x weekly) with fares from $29*! Book now at https://t.co/Ehj3JdcUFF

*incl. taxes & fees, limited availability for fares https://t.co/KOLmywuyVk

It's baAaaAack! 
Our Saskatoon – Vancouver route starts back up today. Flair fares from #YXE to #YVR start from just $49*, and we saved you a seat! Visit https://t.co/47OpJsr4Vj to book.

*limited availability on fare displayed. Certain conditions may apply. https://t.co/Gk4XCTZPyd

Flair Airlines has joined forces with @SuperChannel!
We are thrilled to partner with another #YEG based company to bring our passengers the ultimate inflight entertainment experience. 

Over 200hrs of content options? Get excited! 👀

Full press release: https://t.co/a6P8OjghX7

data.text:
Happy #WorldPilotsDay! Today, we celebrate the hard work and dedication of pilots from across the aviation industry. Thank you for safely connecting us with the people and places we love. Your hard work, professionalism and commitment does not go unseen.

📷: @FlyYKF https://t.co/RKc3o9skBc
@ someone you wish you were boarding this plane with. https://t.co/3uEtf7sB0B

"There is zero chance that Flair is losing its license on May 3rd. Flair is here to finally make air travel affordable for all Canadians. The cost of air travel in Canada has been too high for too long, and I think we all know the reason why that is." - Stephen Jones, CEO. https://t.co/xLi8sOYRlL

urls.description: Planning to fly to San Francisco? Fly solo or grab your favourite buddy and book cheap flights to San Francisco SFO. Book Flair Airlines now & save big!

data.text:
#TBT to Flair's first San Fran flight 🤩 
We're so excited to add another U.S. destination to our network, with Vancouver launching soon! Explore the city by the bay. Book your flight today! https://t.co/8QUijbtOzK
#YEG – #SFO –2x weekly
#YVR – #SFO –3x weekly (starting 5/17/22) https://t.co/wYvMI4Ucz3
Congratulations to @FlyYKF on their beautiful new domestic arrivals building! We’re honoured to be the first flight through. 🎉✈️ https://t.co/3XNwLDpKok

We're not going anywhere, but you can (for less). ✈️
Use promo code: FLYALL25 and SAVE 25% off base fare on all markets. Offer valid on all flights for travel between April 26 - June 23, 2022. Limited seats available. Visit https://t.co/4CjRLDZG19 and book today! https://t.co/f3cuXzCfvM
